name: First Baptist Church of Corbin
description: Baptist church providing spiritual services and community outreach including the Carnegie Ministries Food Pantry. Offers Sunday worship services, children's ministry, youth ministry, music ministry, and various community support programs. The food pantry serves residents in need with weekly distribution.
source: Verified from official website and search results
hours_of_operation: Office: Monday-Thursday 8:00 AM-4:00 PM, Friday 8:00 AM-Noon; Food Pantry: Thursday 12:00-2:00 PM
notes: Carnegie Ministries Food Pantry is located in the FBC Family Life Center beside the church. Food pantry serves residents in need with weekly distribution on Thursdays. Church offers various ministries including children's ministry, youth ministry, music ministry, and community outreach programs.
